channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SUREFIRE-1324] Surefire incorrectly suppresses exceptions when closing resources.
item.description: There are various places where exceptions thrown when closing resources are suppressed although they should be handled. Additionally, the PrintStream class does not throw exceptions but provides a checkError method to be used instead. This method has not been used after writing to the PrintStream.
item.summary: Surefire incorrectly suppresses exceptions when closing resources.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

GitHub user Tibor17 opened a pull request:

https://github.com/apache/maven-surefire/pull/139

SUREFIRE-1324 Surefire incorrectly suppresses exceptions when closing resources.

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

$ git pull https://github.com/Tibor17/maven-surefire SUREFIRE-1324

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

https://github.com/apache/maven-surefire/pull/139.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

This closes #139

commit 2cf58708f6798f04d0314dce5df4c0ed5c2a09d3
Author: Tibor17 <tibor17@lycos.com>
Date: 2017-01-07T02:55:07Z

SUREFIRE-1324 Surefire incorrectly suppresses exceptions when closing resources.

Github user Tibor17 commented on the issue:

https://github.com/apache/maven-surefire/pull/139

@britter
@ChristianSchulte
If you have no objections to this I will push it to master. Thx.

Github user Tibor17 closed the pull request at:

https://github.com/apache/maven-surefire/pull/139
